page.description: The A5_InstallAmyuni() function installs the Alpha Anywhere printer drivers. You can specify an optional folder where the InstallAmyuniPrinters.exe file is located.

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: Indicates whether the installation was successful.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script installs the Alpha Anywhere printer drivers if they are not already installed.
section.example:
if atc("alpha five printer", ui_printers_get() ) = 0 then
a5_installamyuni() end if

ref.link: printer not activated error code 20 or 30
